body_html:
Why not just add a dim parameter to torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_sequence?

Padding first and catting later means we need copy data twice which is slower than direct padding values to outbound places in kernel.

> Why not just add a `dim` parameter to `torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_sequence`?

Padding first and catting later means we need copy data twice which is slower than direct padding values to outbound places in kernel.
